cloud_connect_datacenter_add_success: Adding datacenter configuration. Click here to view its status.
cloud_connect_datacenter_add_network_add: IPv4 block with a range of 0 to 28
Enter a valid IPv4 block between 0 and 28 (e.g. 128.8.2.0/28)
cloud_connect_datacenter_add_dc_info: You can only have one DC configuration per region.
cloud_connect_datacenter_add_select_asn_: The OVHcloud AS number that will be configured on the OVHcloud Connect routers situated in the DC. This number may be different to the ASN chosen for the PoP.
cloud_connect_datacenter_add_network_add: A private subnetwork configured in your vRack, in the DC selected. This may be an IPv4 block of /28 or higher.
